rules.description: left ctrl → open parenthesis (alone), Hyper + Alt (held on Emacs)
left ctrl → open parenthesis (alone), command + option (held outside Emacs)
right ctrl → close parenthesis (alone), Control + Alt (held on Emacs)
right ctrl → close parenthesis (alone), command + control (held outside Emacs)
right_shift -> f18 (toggle Emacs/Chrome) (alone), Super + Alt (held on Emacs)
command + space → trigger different events on Emacs and elsewhere
on Emacs, close bracket  -> close bracket (alone) control + super (held)
outside Emacs, left_shift -> Option + control (alone) hyphen (held)
On Emacs: diacritics if pressed in succession, otherwise hyper-super modifier
